name: Professor Watts Word Search: Space Voyage
description: Hello Professor Watts here and I need your help! I've been hard at work on my space voyage, collecting samples and documenting important research materials.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Win 7+ Процессор: Intel Core i5 + Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 1GB VRAM DirectX: Версии 9.0 Место на диске: 400 MB
